articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: NZ's Taylor to end international career
articles.description: New Zealand batter Ross Taylor will retire from international cricket at the end of the home summer, ending a 17-year career.
articles.content:
Ross Taylor (left) hit the winning runs for New Zealand in the World Test Championship final against India
New Zealand batter Ross Taylor will retire from international cricket at the end of the hom… [+1238 chars]

articles.author: André Leslie
articles.title: Ashes 40 for 40: Ashton Agar re-lives his historic debut at Trent Bridge in 2013
articles.description: Ashton Agar's debut Test score of 98 batting at number 11 in the 2013 Ashes series was both exhilarating and heartbreaking. Nearly a decade on, the all-rounder says it remains one of his most special cricket memories.
articles.content:
The first impression of Ashton Agar is of your archetypal modern cricketer.
All in one, he's a calculating off-spin bowler, a useful lower-middle order batter and erudite on camera.
This summer he'… [+6437 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
